components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Altan Redes in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altan Redes in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience issues with Verify (2FA) traffic to China. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner AT&T United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 November 2024 at 19:00 PST until 10 November 2024 at 10:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for AT&T United States customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
The AT&T network in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 November 2024 at 20:00 PST until 13 November 2024 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from AT&T United States handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 November 2024 at 20:00 PST until 11 November 2024 at 02:00 PST
11 November 2024 at 20:00 PST until 12 November 2024 at 02:00 PST
12 November 2024 at 20:00 PST until 13 November 2024 at 02:00 PST

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter Scheduled Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the systems performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AWN / AIS network in Thailand is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 November 2024 at 09:00 PST until 09 November 2024 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AWN / AIS Thailand handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
